knimeNode.name: RDKit Calculate Charges
knimeNode.shortDescription: Calculates Gasteiger charges for all atoms of a molecule.

fullDescription.intro: Calculates Gasteiger charges for all atoms of a molecule. The charges are computed using an iterative procedure presented in J. Gasteiger, M. Marseli: Iterative Equalization of Orbital Electronegativity - A Rapid Access to Atomic Charges, Tetrahedron Vol 36 p3219 1980

tab.name: Options
tab.option: The input column with RDKit Molecules.
The name of the new column, which will contain the calculation results.
